    my-vignette

    radar plot for songs

    radar_plot.Rd

    Draw a radar plot to show the value of one song (rank) of each feature and also show the level of each feature that user choose.

    Usage

    radar_plot(x, rank, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    is an object of class spotify.

    rank

    is the rank of the top 10 songs that we want to plot

    ...

    other possible parameters for this method.

    Value

    fig is the radar plot

    Author

    Ting Yang

    Examples

    top10_song <- Spotify_scoring(genres = "Funk",
features=c("Danceability","Energy","Loudness","Speechiness","Liveness"),
levels = c(9,8,5,4,7))
radar_plot(top10_song, 1)
